short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eliminate distractions such as recommended videos, like count, and comments while browsing YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of being distracted from the videos you want to watch on YouTube? Do you find yourself mindlessly scrolling and clicking through other videos? The FocusTube Chrome extension is here to help you cut out the distractions and focus on the content you care about.

FocusTube eliminates the temptation of incessantly clicking through related videos, likes/dislikes, and comments. This makes your browsing experience smoother and effortless. No more browsing down a rabbit hole of unrelated videos, freeing up more of your time for the videos that matter.

Not only does FocusTube get rid of the clutter, but it is easy to install and use. With just a single click of the button, all the extra sections of the video page are hidden. This will also help declutter your screens, giving you ample space for the videos you're interested in.

With FocusTube you can streamline your YouTube experience like never before. Find the videos you care about on your own terms, without the distractions and notifications that cause you to veer off course. Get more out of YouTube while avoiding the hassle of aimless browsing.
